::FireBlade::
FireBlade in a move of desperation of the beast gaining the uppper
hand yanked his body as hard as he could his left arm ripping from the
rest of his body.  He staggered back a couple of steps. Then
mechfluild leaking out his shoulder he touched his sword to his armor
around the leak instantly sealing it.
"Now your mine." he said calmly geting into a defensive stance.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Megan Solmonson" <tmrattrap@h...> wrote:
>
> * Iron Raptor could taste the mech fluid of FireBlade touch her tongue.
> And slowly, the inner jaws from the roof of her mouth crept towards
the arm
> that we trapped by her teeth.
> But her head was almost pulled back by FireBlade as he pulled, so
her neck
> strained to keep pulling her own way.
> Luckily, this time, her tail had moved out of the way of FireBlades
sword,
> gicing it tome to heal.  And that's just what it did.
> The armor/skin began to fuse together as she concintrated on mending
the
> wound.
> The inner jaws finally slammed down to get a further lock on his arm,
> pulling back and biting again, only to pull back a second time.
Ripping and
> mutilating.
> Iron Raptor's black eyes suddenly focused on the movement of
FireBlade's
> shoulder mounted grenade launcher, suddenly pushing forward and
opening her
> mouth more so that she could get the whole of his shoulder into it.
> She slammed her head down onto him, hoping that he would fall and
she could
> maul him from there.
> But one of her arms came up and tried to grab the arm with the sword.*
>
> " Not as easily won over as you though, am I?!"
>
>
>
>
